backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, posts, comments, likes, and authorization-backed CRUD with persistent maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and design token definitions providing the app's color system and theming.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing auth, profile loading, view switching, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Authenticated layout with navigation bars, logout handling, and new post dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/EditProfileDialo: Modal dialog for editing a user's profile with form fields and backend update mutation.
frontend/src/components/NewPostDialog.ts: Modal form for creating a new post with image upload, preview, progress tracking, and submission.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a post with author info, image, like button, comment button, timestamp, and caption.
frontend/src/components/PostCommentsDial: Dialog showing post comments with timestamps and a form to add new comments.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog for entering and submitting initial profile details like display name and bio.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, identity loading, and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating profiles and posts via an actor, including helpers for current user, profiles, posts, and creation actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark OKLCH color variables and utility classes for coral-themed styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Feed page that loads all posts, displays skeletons or errors, and renders PostCard components.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile page showing user info, posts, follow actions, and an edit profile dialog with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: User search page with debounced input that queries profiles and displays results or skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Sign-in screen using Internet Identity with branding, login button, and loading state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, extended theming, and plugin integrations for typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Instagram-like app, listing required images and implemented features with versions and notes.
